snippet: Democrats have made a number of misleading claims about taxes, civil liberties and a Mitt Romney quote. But Bill Clinton’s claim about job creation under Democratic presidents appears to be true.
abstract: Check Point column finds that Democrats made a number of misleading claims about taxes, civil liberties and a Mitt Romney quote during their speeches at the Democratic National Convention; notes that Bill Clinton's impressive claim about the superiority of job creation under Democratic presidents appears to be true.

byline.original: By MICHAEL COOPER, SCOTT SHANE and ANNIE LOWREY

lead_paragraph: Democrats have made a number of misleading claims about taxes, civil liberties and a Mitt Romney quote. But Bill Clinton’s claim about job creation under Democratic presidents appears to be true.

headline.seo: Democrats Stretch the Truth in Talk and Text - Check Point
headline.main: A Startling Truth Amid the Hyperbole
headline.print_headline: A Startling Truth Amid the Hyperbole
